author: chadle
title: Cardano NFT Search Engine
description: There are no applications that can search tokens based on metadata. All applications currently search on policy ID and token name.
solution: Release a search engine that searches on Cardano tokens based on metadata. We have a test build that works but needs improvements.
experience: We currently run the BBHMM stake pool since the ITN.  Our team manages infrastructure and runs secures applications 24/7/365.
